import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Register = () => { const [values,setValues]=useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'' }) const handleInput=(event)=>{ setValues(prev => ({...prev,[event.target.name]:[event.target.value]})) } const navigate=useNavigate(); const handleSubmit=async(event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8081/register',values) .then(res => { console.log(res); navigate('/') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
